description: This is the a sample quiz

questions.text: If the weather forecast says it'll be "overcast", it means it'll be
Which word best describes very cold weather?
A storm with lots of snow and very strong winds is called

It was a ________ night, so we lay on our backs and looked at the stars.

 foggy
 clear
 slushy

a) foggy b) clear c) slushy
5. The temperature at which water freezes is 32 degrees 

 Celsius
 Centigrade
 Fahrenheit

a) Celsius b) Centigrade c) Fahrenheit
6. Which results from air pollution?

 fog
 smog
 sleet

a) fog b) smog c) sleet
7. If it's raining very lightly, it's

 drizzling
 puddling
 piddling

a) drizzling b) puddling c) piddling
8. If it's hot with a lot of moisture in the air, we can say it's 

 rainy
 boiling
 humid

a) rainy b) boiling c) humid
9. Which is not a form of precipitation?

 rain
 lightning
 hail

a) rain b) lightning c) hail
10. What do we use to measure the temperature?

 a thermometer
 a meteorologist
 a wind chill factor

a) a thermometer b) a meteorologist c) a wind chill factor
